source: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_SEQ_00<tab>The meandering moogle of Moghome is tossing and turning.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_SEQ_00<tab>Le Mog fiévreux marmonne quelque chose d'un air inquiet.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_SEQ_01<tab>The meandering moogle has taken his medicine and is well on the mend, but one thing hampers his recovery─his concern for his fluffy friend, who has not yet returned from his moca-gathering expedition. He bids you return to the Monsterie and bring the mercurial moogle back to Moghome.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_SEQ_01<tab>Le Mog fiévreux s'inquiète pour son ami qui était parti chercher <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8AE70202 /var>. Il aimerait que quelqu'un aille s'assurer qu'il va bien. Retournez à Monstrère pour voir s'il est encore là-bas.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_SEQ_02<tab>You find the mercurial moogle hiding from a swarm of vicious vilekin. You do away with the insects, freeing the moogle to return to his friend's side. Follow the mercurial moogle back to Moghome to check on the patient's progress.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez retrouvé le Mog haletant qui s'était caché pour échapper à des guêpes géantes. Il s'est empressé de retourner au chevet de son ami après que vous avez chassé les insectes belliqueux. Retournez vous aussi voir le Mog fiévreux au Nid-Mog.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_SEQ_03<tab>Relieved of his burden of cares by his friend's safe return, the meandering moogle has made a full recovery. He thanks you effusively for saving not only his own life, but that of his flighty friend as well.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_SEQ_03<tab>Le Mog fiévreux était si rassuré de voir son ami sain et sauf qu'il s'est im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment senti beaucoup mieux et vous a chaudement remercié<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour votre aide.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_CAREGIVERMOG01836_000_000<tab>I've given my friend the medicine, kupo. His fever's gone down, but he still hasn't got his energy back. Honestly, you bend over backwards for some moogles, and they still don't get better!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_CAREGIVERMOG01836_000_000<tab>Il va lui falloir un peu de temps avant que la fièvre tombe, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_LYINGMOGB01836_000_010<tab>I feel a lot better, kupo... It must be because of that moca leaf that my friend went to find for me. But where is my friend, kupo? He isn't hurt, is he?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_LYINGMOGB01836_000_010<tab>Houuu... Où est passé mon ami, kuppo<var 1D /var>? Je croyais qu'il était revenu avec <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8AE70202 /var>. Je me fais un sang d'encre pour lui. Ça me rend malade...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_LYINGMOGB01836_000_011<tab>He said he was going to the Monsterie, but the Monsterie is full of monsters! Maybe the monsters got him, and...agh! I don't feel well, kupo! I don't think I'll ever feel well until I see my friend again! Please bring him back to me, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_LYINGMOGB01836_000_011<tab>Est-ce qu'il serait encore à Monstrère<var 1D /var>? Il faut que quelqu'un aille le chercher, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_LYINGMOGB01836_000_020<tab>My friend went to find the moca leaf to cure my fever, but he didn't come back... You don't think the monsters got him, do you? Or a loose stone? A loose stone once landed on my head, kupo. I couldn't feel my pom-pom for a week... Please bring my friend back to Moghome!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_LYINGMOGB01836_000_020<tab>Houuu... Je suis tellement inquiet pour mon ami que ça me rend encore plus malade... Il faut que quelqu'un aille le chercher, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_CAREGIVERMOG01836_000_021<tab>Everybody knows his friend's a little flighty, but the fellow has been gone a long time, even by his standards... Would you mind going back to the Monsterie and seeing what's keeping him, kupo? It looks like our patient won't ever recover until he's got his friend back.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_CAREGIVERMOG01836_000_021<tab>C'est vrai que nous n'avons toujours pas revu le Mog qui était parti chercher <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8AE70202 /var>. Si ça se trouve, il est encore à Monstrère, kuppo...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_LYINGMOGA01836_000_030<tab>Adventurer, is that you? Thank goodness you came, kupo! A swarm of nasty bugs appeared, so I had to hide. Now that they're gone, I can head back to Moghome and see how my friend's getting on!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_LYINGMOGA01836_000_030<tab>Kuppopo<var 1D /var>!? Ah, c'est vous<var 1D /var>! Pfiouuu<var 1D /var>! Je suis content de vous voir<var 1D /var>! Je m'étais caché ici pour échapper à ces vilaines guêpes<var 1D /var>! Merci de les avoir chassées, kuppo<var 1D /var>! Je me dépêche de retourner au chevet de mon ami<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_LYINGMOGA01836_000_040<tab>I managed to make it back in one piece, kupo! When those big bad bees started chasing me, I thought I was for it!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_LYINGMOGA01836_000_040<tab>Pfiouuu<var 1D /var>! Je crois que ces guêpes ne m'auraient jamais laissé tranquille si vous n'étiez pas venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_CAREGIVERMOG01836_000_041<tab>Welcome back, adventurer. When our patient saw his friend had returned, he perked right up! I bet our mercurial friend here thinks it's his return that's done the trick and not my marvelous medicine, kupo! Though I suppose we wouldn't have either if it wasn't for you...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_CAREGIVERMOG01836_000_041<tab>Ce pauvre Mog a im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment repris des couleurs quand il a vu son ami revenir. Merci d'être allé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> le chercher, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_LYINGMOGB01836_000_042<tab>Hello, adventurer! I feel a lot better now, and my friend is safe and sound too, kupo! You're a lifesaver, in more ways than one!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ504_01839_LYINGMOGB01836_000_042<tab>Ça me rassure de voir mon ami sain et sauf. Je me sens déjà beaucoup mieux. Nous vous devons une fière chandelle, kuppo<var 1D /var>!
